document.full_text: ad spending in the united states in the fourth quarter increased 7 percent from the same period of 2009, according to kantar media for an increase of 6.5 percent for all of 2010.
document.title: last year was a good year for ad spending, report finds
lines_and_colors: ad spending in the united states in the fourth quarter increased 7 percent from the same period of 2009, according to kantar media for an increase of 6.5 percent for all of 2010.
